name: Krithika Kumar and Sree Hamsini Balamurugan were FIRST place winners in the AMICOS Indomie Inter-school Quiz Contest 2019. Asian School has bagged this trophy 2 years in row.
ASB were winners of the cheering trophy at the AMICOS Indomie Inter-school Quiz Contest 2019. Asian School has bagged this trophy 3 years in row.
Kapil Rajesh Kavitha and Ancel John were FIRST place winners in the AMICOS Indomie Inter-school Quiz Contest 2018
ASB were winners of the cheering trophy at the AMICOS Indomie Inter-school Quiz Contest 2018
